attributes.action: Increase sentincing for animal cruelty with http://infoonpetition.weebly.com/
attributes.additional_details: The Croydon Cat killer has done the former, he clearly should spend more than 3 months in prison. Yes, this is an extreme, but he is still doing it and will not be deterred by the ludicrously lenient terms that are currently given. A woman who imprisoned dogs to starve them was given a suspended sentence. A man who stabbed a cat to death was given a lesser sentence to run concurrently with the punishment for attacking his wife. Visit http://infoonpetition.weebly.com/ for proposed guidelines.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. The action needs to be set out clearly in the petition.
